help_articles.title: Getting Started
help_articles.excerpt: Learn the basics of using our platform
help_articles.content:
# Getting Started

Welcome to our platform! This guide will help you get started.

## Creating Your Account

1. Click the Sign Up button
2. Enter your email and password
3. Verify your email address

## Your First Steps

- Complete your profile
- Explore the dashboard
- Set up your preferences

help_articles.title: Managing Your Profile
help_articles.excerpt: Learn how to update your profile information and settings
help_articles.content:
# Managing Your Profile

Your profile contains important information about your account.

## Updating Information

- Click on your avatar
- Select Profile Settings
- Make your changes
- Click Save

## Profile Settings

You can update:
- Name and email
- Profile picture
- Notification preferences

help_articles.title: Billing and Subscriptions
help_articles.excerpt: Everything you need to know about billing and managing your subscription
help_articles.content:
# Billing and Subscriptions

Manage your subscription and billing information.

## Viewing Your Plan

Navigate to Billing to see your current plan and usage.

## Upgrading or Downgrading

- Go to Billing
- Click Change Plan
- Select your new plan
- Confirm the change

## Payment Methods

Add or update your payment method in Billing settings.

help_articles.title: Troubleshooting Login Issues
help_articles.content:
# Troubleshooting Login Issues

Having trouble logging in? Here are some common solutions.

## Forgot Password

1. Click Forgot Password on the login page
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for reset instructions
4. Follow the link to reset your password

## Account Locked

If your account is locked, contact support for assistance.
